text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to state that in the American system, the copyright holder could choose to pursue actual damages or statutory damages. Section II, subsection C, under 'Damages (17 U.S.C. \u00a7 504)' explicitly states: 'Actual Damages (lost profits) + Defendant\u2019s Profits. Statutory Damages ($750\u2013$150,000 per work (if willful infringement)).' This directly addresses the requirement to mention the choice between actual and statutory damages under U.S. law.", "criterion_id": "661ecb64-b694-403f-97ea-781b4eca98f4"}
